alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 12 at 2:54AM CST until December 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Traverse and Big Stone Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
